name: Shamer
description: Shamer is a simple micro-service with the goal of making it dead simple to gamify code coverage.

GH_BOT_MESSAGE.value: Code coverage reports have been generated

GH_ORG.description: Github Org ID (from the Github API)

GH_REPOS.description: Comma-separated Github repo names to track coverage for

LANGS.description: Comma-separated language codes to collect coverage for (semicolon-separated for multiple repos, one per repo)

STORAGE_COLLECTIONS.description: Comma-separated names of Mongo collections to store repo coverage data in (one per repo)

CURRENT.description: Comma-separated values of current code coverage percentages (one per repo)

CI_RESTART_URL.description: Restart endpoint for CI service ($build_id$ and $api_key$ will be substituted) [optional]

MODE.description: S3 file transfer mode (proxy or redirect)

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Number of gunicorn workers to run
